# px-drawer


## Usage
The following is how to use the component.

```
$ bower install
```


```html
 Markup
```

## Development
The following is how to develop on this component.

1. Clone repository

  ```
  $ git clone
  ```

2. Install dependencies

  ```
  $ npm install
  ```

3. Start local server

  ```
  $ npm start
  ```

4. Compile styles

  ```
  $ npm run build
  ```


5. Run tests

  ```
  $ npm test
  ```
